title: What were the Strictly Come Dancing leaderboard results from last night?
text:
Did anyone score a perfect ten? (Picture: PA)

From Kelvin Fletcher’s iconic samba skills to the endless gossip about the ‘curse’, Strictly Come Dancing truly is the gift that keeps on giving.

After last night’s performances, the time has almost come for us to see the who will be going home.

Here’s a reminder of what scores the Strictly contestants achieved on Saturday night, ahead of the next elimination.

The Strictly Come Dancing leaderboard results for episode four Alex Scott and Neil Jones – 23 Will Bayley and Janette Manrara – 24 Chris Ramsay and Karen Hauer – 26 Dev Griffin and Dianne Buswell – 27 David James and Nadiya Bychkova – 28 Viscountess Emma Weymouth and Aljaž Škorjanec – 28 Catherine Tyldesley and Johannes Radebe – 30 Michelle Visage and Giovanni Pernice – 31 Mike Bushell and Katya Jones – 32 Saffron Barker and AJ Pritchard – 33 Emma Barton and Anton Du Beke – 35 Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse – 36 Karim Zeroual and Amy Dowden – 38

It probably comes as little surprise to Strictly fans that everyone’s favourite snake-hipped Emmerdale alum Kelvin has been one of those to top the Strictly leaderboard again this week with his partner Oti Mabuse.

Advertisement

Advertisement

While Oti and Kelvin were the first to score tens across the board this season, this week it was CBBC presenter Karim Zeroual and his partner Amy Dowden who came out with a score of 38 overall, which was the best of the week.

Craig Revel Horwood said after their dance: ‘Well I think it’s the first time we’re really seeing a male celebrity lead and it is incredible.’

‘The best dance of the evening,’ Motsi Mabuse said. ‘End of story.’

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Sunday at 7:15pm on BBC One.

description: Did anyone score a perfect ten? Here's a reminder of how the Strictly contestants did ahead of the next elimination.
